name: Mad Derby Racing
description:
Enjoy the world of chaos and destruction with Mad Derby!
Breathtaking battles, unique arenas, lots of modes and different cars won't leave anyone indifferent!

Some of the awesome features of this game:
- Unique battle system
- Easy control
- Realistic, detailed model of damages
- A powerful artificial intelligence of opponents
- 5 high detailed locations
- There is a special Survival mode for experts
- Ability to bet on the game
- Different weather conditions

Get ready to get a lot of emotions from destroying enemies and colorful graphics in this exciting game!
Quickly take the car and go to smash!
